alert.note: Alert for Furnas; Gosper (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 03 at 2:20PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHERN GOSPER AND WESTERN FURNAS COUNTIES THROUGH 245 PM CDT... At 220 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Cambridge, or 28 miles east of McCook, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Holbrook around 225 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will relay your report to the National Weather Service office in Hastings. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for south central Nebraska.
